items.title: Even as they look ahead to midterms, Democrats keep rehashing Biden
items.description: A number of potential 2028 candidates, including Kamala Harris, have recently criticized Biden for his reelection bid.

items.title: Republican Rep. Michael McCaul of Texas will not seek reelection
items.description: The longtime lawmaker, who has at times disagreed with Trump on foreign policy, has been a supporter of Ukraine in its war against Russia.
